name: LivinupRVDelux
0:
”Alexa, turn on dresser light.”
”Alexa, turn on awning.”
”Alexa, turn off slider out”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask Alexa for control your caravan lighting such as kitchen light, bathroom light, awning LED...etc. When you sleepy, just ask Alexa to turn off all light. you won't standup to find wall switch. just ask Alexa!

The skill need to work with Livinup 12 channel controller. and support 8 lighting control command and awning/slider control. 

1. Bathroom light
2. Bedroom light
3. Dresser light
4. Annex light
5. Awning LED
6. Kitchen light
7. Dinette light
8. Feature light

11. Bathroom light 
12. Shower light.

1. Awning
2. Slider Out
